title: Russia Ban Makes Asia Flights Costlier
itunes:title: Russia Ban Makes Asia Flights Costlier
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Reporter Siddharth Philip explains that as flights to Asiareturn, a ban on flying into Russian airspace will make airline travel costlier. Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green shares the details of his story Democrats Hate Musk, But He Might Be Their Savior. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Erik Schatzker discusses the results of Brazil's presidential election and why there's an extreme polarization among the electorate. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, CEO at IG North America.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
